Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Spear, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Sahuagin makes 2 Melee attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Claws or Spear

Abilities.Ability 1: Blood Frenzy, The Sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its HP
Abilities.Ability 2: Limited Amphibiousness, The Sahuagin can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged every few hours to avoid suffocating
Abilities.Ability 3: Shark Telepathy, The Sahuagin can magically command any shark within range
